CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Repayment_Frequency__c ,"Weekly"), Monthly_Repayment__c *52/12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Repayment_Frequency__c ,"Fortnightly"), Monthly_Repayment__c *26/12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Repayment_Frequency__c ,"Monthly"), Monthly_Repayment__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Repayment_Frequency__c ,"Annually"), Monthly_Repayment__c/12, Monthly_Repayment__c))))
CustomField.label: Monthly Calculation
